notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data used in this study contain confidential physical address information and belongs to the City of Harare. This data is available from the corresponding author upon reasonable request and with explicit permission from the Harare City council. The contact person is Dr Prosper Chonzi, the City Health Director ( prochonzi@gmail.com). The Medical Research Council of Zimbabwe (MRCZ) has given permission for the corresponding author to provide the data upon request. The contact details for Research Council of Zimbabwe are: http://www.rcz.ac.zw/. Tel: +(263) 242 304787/733/861 and the address is: 11 Stafford Road Mount Pleasant Harare, Zimbabwe.
